name: Hardware Development
description: Yes! Our team has hands-on experience in building actual functional hardware from ideation to manufacturing. Our debut hardware project, Friday helps people with seamless house automation and management. Friday also helps industries measure their electricity consumption and proffers suggestions on how to curb inefficiencies.

name: Deep Technology
description: Our understanding of Deep Technology such as AI and ML gives an extra edge to solving problems and getting things done. We take the practical approach to Deep Technology. We not only understand cutting edge technology, but strive to understand how to apply this to local issues.

name: Software Development
description: Software is the fuel on which most successful modern brands are run. At Scuudu, we combine the right blend of technical expertise, thorough planning, speed and flawless execution to build reliable and engaging software to meet your needs.

name: Content Creation
description: The right content is everything, and the words we use shape our lives and businesses. Our team of seasoned content creators understand your business requirements and create a voice unique to your brand. This translates to closer connections and clear communication of your values to your target audience.

name: Product Design
description: Design is at the heart of everything we do at Scuudu. We know just how to provide the perfect concept and package, showing attractive interfaces and telling the right story to give your brand a great competitive hedge.

name: Data Analysis, Research & Consultancy
description: At Scuudu, we are helping companies make quick and data-driven decisions in the ever-changing environment by rendering a full set of data analysis and top-tier business consulting. Our data scientists are attentive to the patterns in your data and how it can be taken advantage of, to drive productivity in your business.

name: Game Development
description: We absolutely love games, and we know how to make them. Our experienced game development team uses state of art technology to turn gaming narratives and visuals to engaging games for every market segment you target.

name: Web Development
description: A good website boosts your credibility as a legitimate brand, while showcasing your expertise. The web is one of our favorite playgrounds. We understand your business requirements and translate this into amazing websites and applications. At Scuudu, we measure the impact of our websites and web applications and check against these metrics on deployment.

name: Branding
description: Branding is everything! It communicates the very essence of your business; and sets a tone for interaction with clients and customers.. Our brand team is well-versed in creating a strong brand that tells your story and leaves a definable, long-lasting impression of your company in the consumer's mind.
